title: Shijou Saikyou no Deshi Kenichi (KenIchi: The Mightiest Disciple)
synopsis: Whenever he isn't getting pummeled in the karate club after school, high schooler Kenichi Shirahama can be found with his head buried in one of the many self-help books he carries with him every day. One day, on the way to school, Kenichi accidentally frightens the new student in his class, leading her to throw him down onto the ground. After apologizing for her violent reflexes, she introduces herself as Miu Furinji and asks Kenichi to be her friend.
related_anime: ['Shijou Saikyou no Deshi Kenichi', 'Shijou Saikyou no Deshi Kenichi OVA']
